revised_title: Corrigenda Corrections in Biographical Memoirs of Fellows of the Royal Society
tldr: This article provides corrections for errors found in previous volumes of the Biographical Memoirs of Fellows of the Royal Society. It includes corrections to the entries of Eustace Ebenezer Turner and George Paget Thomson, as well as a mention of J. J. Thomson and the Cavendish Laboratory.
scientific_discipline: Biographies and Book Reviews > Scientific History
